parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if the current mission is a Steam Workshop mission.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isSteamMission'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isSteamMission]]) [[then]]
{
    [[hint]] "Thank you for subscribing to my mission on Steam!";
}
[[else]]
{
    [[hint]] "Thank you for downloading my mission off the Internet!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[markAsFinishedOnSteam]]
</value></part></template></root>
